trans-unit.source: Represents a type that has its lifetime controlled by the workflow runtime.
Types derived from <xref:System.Activities.Handle> have their lifetimes controlled by the workflow runtime.

For workflow variables of handle types, the runtime uses the required default constructor to create an instance of the type, assigns it to the <xref:System.Activities.Variable>, and calls <xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnInitialize%2A> when initializing the environment.
When the variable goes out of scope, <xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnUninitialize%2A> is called.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> class.
Classes that derive from <xref:System.Activities.Handle> must provide a default constructor.
Gets the name to be used by this <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> when added to an activityâ€™s execution properties.
The name of derived type as provided by <xref href="System.Type.FullName"></xref>.
Called by the workflow runtime when the environment that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> is initialized.
The environment in which the handle is being created.
Called by the workflow runtime when the <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> goes out of scope.
The environment in which the handle was created.
Gets the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityInstance"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref>.
The activity instance that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref>.
Throws an <xref href="System.InvalidOperationException"></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> has not been initialized.

<xref:System.Activities.Handle.ThrowIfUninitialized%2A> gives custom handle derived class authors a convenient method to call from any methods or properties of the derived class that are not valid if the <xref:System.Activities.Handle> is uninitialized.
